text: John Albert Ashley (13 October 1912 – 1992) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Mansfield Town and Sheffield Wednesday. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1992 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:English Football League players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Bolsover Colliery F.C. players Category:Shirebrook Miners Welfare F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Sheffield Wednesday F.C. players
title: Jack Ashley (footballer, born 1912)
